item.content:encoded:
CityWorld

The great outdoors is all good and fine but sometimes you just want to go to town.
Not any town will do, how about one that goes on forever or multiple ones separated by the largest mountains possible in MineCraft.
But what is under those mountains?
There is an entire world to explore, have fun!

More pictures can be found here.

The post The City World first appeared on  𝙁𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙙 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙛𝙩 .

item.title: The Tropical World
item.dc:creator: rmellis
item.description:
Tropic is a world gen plugin i was working for some time now and with the new jungle biomes being out i decided to complete it. So what does Tropic do? Well it generates a world that is fully covered with a thick rainforest. The Terrain has some nice hills/beaches, but also pretty high mountains.…

The post The Tropical World first appeared on  𝙁𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙙 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙛𝙩 .
item.content:encoded:
Tropic

is a world gen plugin i was working for some time now and with the new jungle biomes being out i decided to complete it. So what does Tropic do?
Well it generates a world that is fully covered with a thick rainforest. The Terrain has some nice hills/beaches, but also pretty high mountains.
The Generator features a lot of unique BlockPopulators for a individual look:

  • 3 Different, fully custom tree types featuring generated world-trees
  • Lakes and small creeks
  • “Glowshrooms”
  • Bushes and all other foliage that can be found in minecraft
  • All ores/lava/gravel/etc you need
  • Custom caves

Screenshots: https://imgur.com/a/5XFQA

Also thanks alot to @codename_B for allowing me to use his BlockPopulators.

And as always, feedback and suggestions are always welcome, hope you like it.

this world is based on 1.2.3

The post The Tropical World first appeared on  𝙁𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙙 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙛𝙩 .

There are lakes, a custom Treetype, some caves and all ores/mushrooms/flowers/lava… whatever you need. Most of the screenshots were made during development using the seed 1337 if you want to try this world. You…

The post The Nordic World first appeared on  𝙁𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙙 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙛𝙩 .
item.content:encoded:
ABOUT

Nordic is a Worldgenerator which creates a world that will have a nordic looking. There are continents and smaller islands. There are lakes, a custom Treetype, some caves and all ores/mushrooms/flowers/lava… whatever you need. Most of the screenshots were made during development using the seed 1337 if you want to try this world. You might experience some strange spawning locations and some strange blocks around the generated lakes, but it should be very rare.

You have to know how to edit the bukkit.yml or use a plugin that does this part for you, like Pinapp.
The command & permission beneath are not needed if you use Pinapp or edit the bukkit.yml, i just left them in so its possible to take a look on a Nordic world without doing any configuration stuff.

MOAR SCREENS!!111 (including a shiny 360° panorama)

Also thanks alot to @codename_B for allowing me to use his BlockPopulators.







The post The Nordic World first appeared on  𝙁𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙙 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙛𝙩 .

The post The Awesome World (Open Terrain Generator) first appeared on  𝙁𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙙 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙛𝙩 .
item.content:encoded:
Open Terrain Generator (OTG)

  • Table of Contents

X

Table of Contents

  • Note: When updating OTG 1.12.2 be sure to delete OTG-Core.jar or it will not be updated.
  • What is OTG?
  • The basic features of OTG:
  • What kind of worlds can I create?
    • OTG Wiki: http://openterraingen.wikia.com/wiki/Open_Terrain_Generator_Wiki
    • Subreddit: /r/openterraingen
    • Join us on Discord at: openterraingen
    • Use OTGEdit to create world packs: OTGEdit


To learn about the mod in more detail visit our Wiki

What is OTG?

OTG is an advanced, fully customizable world generator. Through its various configuration files it gives the user control over almost every aspect of Minecraft’s terrain and structure generation, allowing you to generate anything from floating islands to cave worlds with no knowledge of Java required. OTG supports both Spigot (servers) and Forge (servers and singleplayer).

The basic features of OTG:

  • Control horizontal and vertical noise, terrain height and volatility
  • Create new biomes and control the size of biomes, islands and continents
  • Import custom trees and other objects (BO2 and BO3)
  • Control over mob spawning rules and climate settings per biome
  • Generate large custom structures with custom mobs and loot
  • Options for vanilla structures like mineshafts, strongholds and villages
  • Full control of all blocks placed during world generation: ores, plants, dungeons, ponds and many more
  • Customizable options for caves & canyons
  • Visual settings like custom foliage, water and sky colors (OTG client required)
  • Generating biome maps from images
  • Forge Multi-dimension support (create your own dimension and travel to it via a portal!)

What kind of worlds can I create?

Here are some examples of custom presets (created using only OTG functionality):

  • Biome Bundle [Screenshots] [Download]
  • Skylands [Screenshots] [Download]
  • Flatlands [Screenshots] [Download]
  • Void [Download]
  • Dregora [Download]
  • Dimensions [Download]
  • Dungeons [Download]
  • Tutorial World [Download]
  • Cartographer (WIP) [Download]

OTG Wiki: http://openterraingen.wikia.com/wiki/Open_Terrain_Generator_Wiki

Subreddit: /r/openterraingen

Join us on Discord at: openterraingen

Use OTGEdit to create world packs: OTGEdit

 

Recent Improvements:

Spoiler (click to show)

1.12.2 v6 / 1.11.2 v10 (1.11.2 v10 will be available soon):

  • Added GravityFactor setting to the worldconfig (this requires a Forge client with OTG). Forge only atm, can be used to change the gravity of a world/dimension.
  • Some fixes for dims when using other mods that add dims.
  • Smoothing fix for terrain (will cause minor seams in your world when entering newly generated terrain, looks much nicer though! See: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/285816707040280586/415940913848647690/output_8hRRQB.gif).
  • Savetodisk infinite loop fixed (one instance, there may still be more).
  • DIM folders being recreated on server restart bug fixed. – Fixed a bug for Lost Cities dimension.
  • Added a method for Spigot plugin developers (requested on the git).
  • Added TERRAIN_GENERATOR dimension tag when sending other mods (like RC) dimension info via Forge IMC when an OTG dimension is created/destroyed.
  • Frozensurfacehelper stackoverflow bug fixed (thanks BrainStone).
  • BO3 CustomStructures now try to avoid vanilla structures as much as they can.
  • Added /otg biomes command for Forge for debugging biome registry problems.

Older:

  • Fixes for all known crashes including ones caused by mods (excluding other biome mods which remain incompatible), including:
    – Dimension switching/mineshaft crash
    – Forge biome dictionary crash
    – Java preconditions crash
  • Fixed compatibility issues with a number of mods including Pam’s Harvestcraft, IC2, Quark, Recurrent Complex, Roguelike Dungeons and more.
  • Added working Forge biome dictionary support for all biome types, added BiomeDictId option in BiomeConfigs (Forge Only)
  • Added new in game UI allowing simpler single player world creation and multiple worlds with the same preset (Forge Only)
  • Added a built in map pre-generator with in-game UI, configurable via world creation screen and WorldConfig (Forge Only)
  • Added world borders configurable in the WorldConfig
  • Basic multi-dimension support (more features and improvements will follow) (Forge Only)
    *Added Cartographer world mapper, a work in progress feature that adds a miniature map of the world that spawns in its own dimension and can be used to teleport around the world and explore quickly. (Forge Only)
  • Added InheritMobsBiomeName for BiomeConfigs and implemented mob inheritance (improves compatibility with mob mods) (Forge Only)
  • Fixed new worlds not generating dirs or default bc’s, also tweaked default bc’s to be more like vanilla Minecraft
  • Added Entity() function
  • Forge and Bukkit versions merged into a single .jar file

 

For a comprehensive change log visit the Github project page here.

The post The Awesome World (Open Terrain Generator) first appeared on  𝙁𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙙 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙛𝙩 .

item.title: The Epic World
item.dc:creator: rmellis
item.description:
​ EpicWorldGenerator brings you the most powerful world generator ever made to spigot. Customize the plugin to generate the world your players have ever dreamed about. Create your own biomes or pick between the premade biomes. EpicWorldGenerator is here to take your server to the next level. ​ Includes 30 biomes in the default configuration…

The post The Epic World first appeared on  𝙁𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙙 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙛𝙩 .
item.content:encoded:
​

EpicWorldGenerator brings you the most powerful world generator ever made to spigot. Customize the plugin to generate the world your players have ever dreamed about. Create your own biomes or pick between the premade biomes. EpicWorldGenerator is here to take your server to the next level.

​
  • Includes 30 biomes in the default configuration
    • Birch Forest
    • Bonsai Forest
    • Cold Ocean
    • Coral reefs
    • Deciduous Forest
    • Deep Ocean
    • Desert
    • Fantasy Forest
    • Farmland
    • Forgotten Forest
    • Frozen Ocean
    • Jungle
    • Jungle Edge
    • Lukewarm Ocean
    • Mega Spruce Taiga
    • Mega Taiga
    • Mesa
    • Ocean
    • Pine Forest
    • Plains
    • River
    • Savanna
    • Scots pine forest
    • Snowy Pine
    • Stone Forest
    • Swamp Edge
    • Swamp
    • Swampland
    • Tropical Forest
    • Volcano
  • Web panel
    • Create new biomes in a few clicks without any prior knowledge
    • Configure every detail in each biome and manage the global world settings. The panel will assist you so you can focus on the creative part.
  • Biome packs
    • Create a new world using a simple GUI where you can pick between multiple biome packs, optimized for different game modes.
  • Vanilla biomes
    • Generate vanilla biomes next to normal biomes
    • Remix vanilla biomes using every option you have for normal biomes generated by the plugin. You can even import features from vanilla biomes into normal biomes
  • Generate world from an image
    • Take full control over the world by generating the world from an image.
  • Islands
    • Generate detailed islands around the world
  • Combines the best
    • Includes the best features from the vanilla world generator
      • All structures, like water monuments, woodland mansion etc are included.
      • Ores will stay the same
      • Caves will generate same way you are used to
  • Flat areas
    • Tired of flattening out the world near spawn points in your world? No need for that anymore, the plugin will do it for you with nice transitions to the rest of the world.
  • Seed support
  • Biome teleportation
    • Instant teleportation to closest biome
  • Custom structures
    • Create your own structures to generate in each biome

​

​




​







Fanmade cinematic (version 7.2)

Old version (version 6.0)


VintagBeef let’s play on his server with EWG installed:

Code (Text):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=suY_EEGSbmM&list=PLnw9-SvEl3c6ut4Ij09QZq1rTVUaxLfaJ


/EWG bugreport – Report a bug from the world generator.



Join testplugins.com
and use /EpicWorldGen


Coming soon…

​

This generator is a little bit slower than the default generator. To prevent lag spikes at heavy chunk load, it recommended to pre-generate the world. This can be done using the world border plugin.






More pictures coming soon, there many more biomes
​

The post The Epic World first appeared on  𝙁𝙡𝙤𝙮𝙙 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙛𝙩 .
